Magic Power has increased!
I’m sick and tired of lizards!nn-I want... rabbit meat for some change!nn-I’ll be able to cook something if I just had one Rabbit Meat and two Rua Leaves!
Tap on the door on the left bottom to exit from the cave.
Tap on the Magic Pot to craft a new item from ingredients.
You can use items in the inventory by tapping on the inventory box inside the house.
You can train by tapping on certain items near the cave.
You can sleep by tapping on the bed inside the cave. After a good nap, HP and MP will be fully restored.
You can see recipe for Magic Craft by tapping on the Magic Pot, or from the menu if you’re out on field.

Get 1 Rabbit Meat, 2 Rua Leaves to craft a Rualet!nn-You can see the ingredients again by tapping on the Magic Pot.
There is no information to show. Please see Options button on the top right corner of screen!
I promised Michelle to meet up with her on the top of Kentz Mountain on the night with the brightest moon. We weren’t that close before, but in times like this, we’d better stick together!
Tap on Menu from field, or return home to see clock on screen. Go to bed or move to a different location when clock points to 9 o’clock; it will turn to night with the brightest moon.

Would you like to hit the rock? Hitting the rock requires 40% of overall HP. Strength+2, Defense+1.
Would you like to do push-ups? Push-ups require 20% of overall HP. Strength+2.
Would you like to do meditation on the roof? Meditation on roof requires 20% of overall HP. MP +3, Magic Power+1.
Would you like to practice magic? Magic practice requires 40% of overall MP. Magic Power +2, Max MP +1%(min3, max50).
Would you like to do meditation under waterfall? Meditation under waterfall requires 50% of overall HP. Max MP +5%(min3, max50). Magic Power +1, MP +3 or more.
Magic Power Reflection::
Close the Magic Encyclopedia screen and go outside to collect the ingredients!
Night with the brightest moon is right around the corner.nn-One more night and it will be the night with the brightest moon.nn-Luna’s magic power will be 30% more effective.

Lord Aimhard’s temple is in the east. To get there, I need to get past the Icy Field to the south... Lord Aimhard’s temple is pretty far from Vavelia Kingdom, so maybe there aren’t any warriors there.
It’s the night with the brightest moon. Luna’s magic will be 30% more effective!
Would you like to save the man hanging from the cliff?
I saved your life, but why are you keep doing this?
Give me gold. I’ll spare your life.
Stop it. I’m not going to do anything.
Seems like those humans are in danger.
They will probably repay me if I saved them.
Humans are ungrateful creatures. I don't want to be bothered.
What would you like to do with Robin?
Go and beat him.
Give up and go home.
Luna taught Pieberry about basic ice magic.

This hideout is close to the village, and you will get caught if you spend too much time inside. It's dangerous out, but you should explore the world and become stronger to increase the chance of survival when you encounter warriors later!

You were defeated! Would you like to turn back time?
Tonight is the night with the brightest moon. Luna’s magic attacks will be 30% more effective!
The sun is up. Time to rise and shine!
I need to see if Lord Arua and Lord Durok's springs were recovered. Lord Aramute is gonna be at either one of those places!
The pet you just caught has been sent to Southwest side of Kentz Mt.!
To Lord Arua’s island! I recall... there was a narrow passage in the western side of Kentz Cave. I used to go there often. Will I be able to go through that passage now?
Lord Durok’s temple should be up the eastern side of rocky hill. I hope there’s no warriors...
Selected pet cannot swim!
The tool is already in use!
Thank you for playing the demo version of Witch Spring2!nn-Press OK to go back to the main menu!
From now on, ability points gained from battles will be doubled!
This Magic Encyclopedia has already been added!
Would you live to give Purified Magic Stone to the dwarf?

Artillery support from Dwarf Cannon!
Training speed average
Training speed fast
Training event will be played at 2x speed.

From now on, you will receive artillery support from Dwarf Cannon at certain points during battle. Damage inflicted by Dwarf Cannon will be doubled each time it is fired, as the battle lasts longer.

Now let’s go see Lord Aramute. I promised to meet him on the top of the Kentz Mountain on the night with the brightest moon. He told me they’re watching him... I wonder if he will be able to come and meet me tonight.
Black Joe has been added to the pet list!
From now on, you can summon Black Joe as a pet. But keep in mind that Black Joe is originally Pieberry’s pet, and may not be available to summon.
You cannot summon Black Joe at the moment.
Black Joe left because Pieberry summoned him.
Humans have created Mutated Nuuk from Dark Magic Stone. The Mutated Nuuk is attacking other Nuuks... I should help them out!
Mutated Nuuk Defeat Quest Complete! Black Joe tells me these Nuuks are going to help me someday...
Would you like to help the humans in danger?
The Pope was the bad guy, it’s a surprise to hear that the king actually liked the deities... What a surprise! I guess not all humans are the same.
Dark Traders seems like professionals of black market. They want me to get Royal Palace Pass from a warrior...
First Deal with Red Beard Completed! Well... Not bad, huh?
Red Beard wants me to get Klarates Leaf for him. Should I go and defeat a Klarates or just craft one out of Kreytes leaves...?
I’m going to get eggs of a fish called Blitz. I’ve heard that the electricity from its eggs is a good source of electrical power... Blitz can be found on the West Shore.
Blitz’s Egg Sac quest complete! My clothes got all wet...!
He wants me to get Dark Magic Stone for him... I’ll have to defeat the Dark Warrior near one of the temples. I can probably find one near either Lord Elysion's temple or Lord Aimhard’s temple.
Gave the Angel's Eye to the dwarves.
Dark Magic Stone quest complete!
Frozen Dark Magic Stone? Sounds like it used to be mined in the ice cave before. I can probably get it from the ice cave.
Frozen Dark Magic Stone quest complete!
Nessie's Luminous Four-Eyes is a super expensive jewelry material. I gotta try and get it in the West Shore area. sigh..... I know I can get at least 20,000G if I sold it inside the village... Pffft!
Nessie's Luminous Four-Eyes quest complete!
Kentz Stone is a stone filled with life. Someone is going to make a healing chair with this. I might be the first one ever to challenge Kentz...! Kentz is on the top of Kentz Mountain.
Kentz Stone Quest Complete!
The Dark Golem with the Big Dark Magic Stone is in the Red Rocky Golem Cave on the Elysion Plains. I wonder who is wanting this stone.
Big Dark Magic Stone quest complete!
Plenty of gold this time, too! Ice Giant! Wait!
Head of Ice Giant quest complete!
They want me to challenge a dragon this time... What in the world do they think I am! Boo.... But they do pay me well. I heard Zirconia Dragon lives in the Dragon Valley...
Zirconia Dragon’s Egg quest complete... Ah... I got ripped off... It's annoying...!!
A Lightning Dragon...? Isn’t this a bit too much? They even ripped me off and now they're asking for this!
Lightening Dragon’s Horn quest complete! Complete with a lot of gold!
I’m never going to deal with the Dark Traders again! Trying to trick me until the very end.... Hmph!
Reputation increased by #power!
Reputation decreased by #power!
A new healing magic recipe has been added!

A villager from Lalaque village asked me to get rid of some wild dogs for them. Sounds like there are a couple of wild dogs roaming around lalaque trees. I should take care of them quickly and go meet Pieberry.
Wild Dog quest complete! Now off to meet Pieberry! She should be somewhere around in the Black Witch’s Forest south to the Merchants’ Road.
Would you like to challenge Panda Kum? All default stats will increase by 5% if you defeat Panda Kum. FYI, Panda Kum will get stronger every time you defeat him.
I’ve been asked to awaken the Ice Witch sealed inside the Ice Cave. Seems like there is an ice spirit guarding that place....

Learned ‘ Magic Power Reuse ‘ from Panda Kum. From now on, you can reuse magic power used in magic attacks to add damage to the next physical attack. You will be inflicting 50% more damage of the previous magic attack when performing a physical attack. The effectiveness will be gradually decreased. It is most effective in consecutive attacks.

You gave meatball to the black cat.
I heard a lot about mom from Lord Aramute. That's why she was so familiar when I first met her... And the way that she looked similar to me was very comforting. I hope she lets herself out soon...!
What, witch? Do you want to trade or something?
Top level Flame, Lightening, Supportive magic and recipe for Pure Spirit Stone have been added!

I’ve promised to meet with Michelle again on the night with the brightest moon. She’s not a saint, but it’s nice to have her around.

Item Inventory

I promised to meet with Robin on the night with the brightest moon. With the power of moonlight, it’s going to be easier to run away if something happens... I should ask him about how to get to Lord Elysion’s temple!
Lord Elysion’s temple is in the west. It’s dangerous because I have to go through Vavelie Road to get there... But maybe I could go if I sneak well.

Robin... He wanted to be a warrior so bad ever since we were little, and now he’s become one! He’s grown taller, too. And a bit good looking..... Nah. He’s probably a weakling in the inside. I should meet him when the moonlight is the brightest, so I can protect him. It seems like he’s going to be stationed to Vavelie Road permanently, so we should be able to meet again.
Oh, I almost forgot from meeting Robin. To Lord Aimhard’s temple! (Am I too happy from meeting him...?)

Defeat golem together? Hmph, do I look like I have nothing better to do? Hm, as if I would go! Hmph...
Robin said he’d prepare so that I can go to Elysion temple on the next night with the brightest moon. It’s great to have a warrior friend...!

Robin... You are the worst human being I’ve ever met in my life. I’m never going to forgive you... and I’m going straight to Lord Aimhard’s temple. I’m gonna beat the crap out of those warriors...! The map says Lord Elysion's temple is right below Vavelie Road.
Magic/Battle Guide

[ Moonstone Charge ]nn-nn-Every time Luna uses magic, Magic Power is charged to the Moonstone. Once Moonstone is fully charged, the effectiveness of next physical/magical attack is doubled. After the attack, moonstone charge will be reset to 0. More Magic Power will be charged to the moonstone if more MP is spent.

[ Moonlight Witch ]nn-nn-Luna’s Moonstone will become brighter in moonlight. On the night of the brightest moon, the clock will point to 9 o'clock and Luna’s magic will become 30% more effective with the help of the brightly shining moonstone.

[ Magic Slot ]nn-nn-There are a total of three slots where you can equip magic. The Primary Slot, which is the first slot, will boost magic effectiveness by 20%.nn-The Secondary Slot boost magic effectiveness by 10% uses 10% less MP.nn-Sub slot, which is the last slot, will use 20% less MP.

[ Slot Combination ]nn-nn-There are three types of Magic Circles. The Central Magic Circle will decide the attribute and the basic power of the magic.nn-The Booster Magic Circle which surrounds the Central Magic Circle boosts the effectiveness of the Central Magic Circle, while using a bit more MP.nn-Lastly, the Focus Magic Circle which is equipped on the outermost helps reduce the MP usage.

[ Attribute Effect ]nn-nn-When you use magic, the effect of your magic will show up on the enemy’s HP bar. % represents the power of the magic effectiveness, and the green number represents the number of turns the effect will last. Flame magic sets the ground on fire, and gives continuous damage to the enemy. The effectiveness of the fire is proportionate to Luna’s magic power. Thunder magic is the most powerful type of magic, and uses the most MP out of all the offensive magics. It leaves an electric field where it was used, and decrease enemy’s physical/magic defense. Ice magic tends to afflict the least damage out of all the offensive magics, but it uses the least amount of MP and freezes the enemy so their agility is decreased.
The springs are recovering one by one. There is somebody that’s restoring the springs...! Could it be the warrior in golden armor.... Lord Aramute? He went towards Vavelie Road!
The warrior in golden armor.... Is there a way I can find out?

<Max Consecutive Attack Count>nn-If this is greater than 2, number of weapon swings for physical attacks will increase up to the max consecutive attack count. You can increase the max consecutive attack count by completing certain quests. The maximum count you can reach is 6. Current max consecutive attack count is #num.

< Reuse Magic Power >nn-Any physical attack after a magic attack will have additional impact of as much as 50% of the previous magic attack.
(This can be learned by completing a certain quest)
< Artillery Support >nn-You can receive powerful artillery support from the Dwarves while battling a gigantic monster. Damage from Artillery Support will be increased every turn.
<Night of the Brightest Moon>nn-On the night where the moon is the brightest, Moonstone will shine the most.nn-When this happens, all of Luna’s magic attacks are 30% more effective.
(Currently activated)
Field Menu Button
Return Home Button

< Use Item >nn-Rabbit meat is an item you can get on Mt. Kentz that will help recover your HP. Whenever you're out of HP, tap on the Tool icon from the Field Menu to use Rabbit Meat. Your HP will be restored!
< Review Magic Recipes >nn-If you can't remember which magic ingredients to collect, tap on the Magic Encyclopedia icon on the Field Menu to see the recipe again!
< Summon/Dismiss a Pet>nn-You can dismiss pets on the field at any time. And of course, you can summon them at any time. Make a good use of the Pet icon from Field Menu!

Klarates Leaf Quest Complete!
You can feel a heavy vibration from a distance.
Lord Aramute...! I’ll be your strength! I’m going to train myself hard until we meet again on the top of Kentz Mountain!
I got too happy about it! It’s embarrassing! Booo.....!!

I really need to get it together, but I might have loosened up from hanging out with Pieberry too much. I should work on getting my magic power increased until I meet Lord Aramute again. It would be nice to go back to Kentz Mountain once in a while. (And check on the hideout...)

Robin really looked tired. A running leaf will be good for him, but it’s not like I’m his girlfriend! Why do I care? I could probably get my hands on it from Northern Vavelia Hill, but why go through the trouble?
You even came to this hideout to get me? This was our special place of memory! This is how much you want to get promoted? Really?
Got the running leaf! Aaaaaaaargh~~!!
Failed to log in! Please double check your network connection!
Jude!! How could you do this!? You were Lord Aramute’s secretary! And calling deities witch...!!
Making Robin........like this............. Pope..........!! And Jude......!!! I can never forgive you...... Never!!!!!!
You can come back in to the prison through the waterway next to the Hideout in Mt. Kentz. Keep in mind that you will not have another chance to warp home once you come back.

Achievement Update
HP is the most basic stat for activity. You can use HP for training, and you will lose if HP turns 0 during battle.
MP is the mental energy with which you can use magic. Every time you use magic, certain amount of MP will be drained.
Magic Power is the amount of power your magic has. The higher your Magic Power is, the more effective your offensive/cure magics will be.
Effectiveness of physical attacks depends on Strength. Strength may increase to increase effectiveness of your attacks, with use of certain weapons.

Agility affects your moves. With high Agility, there is higher chance to get your turn faster in battles, and higher probability that your physical attacks will hit your enemy. However, probability of offensive magic hits will not be affected by Agility.
Defense decreases the damage you get from enemy.
Reputation represents the amount of positive impressions that humans have towards Luna. High Reputation can change the ending of the game.

Finished updating Achievements based on data from Diary. If there is any Achievement left out, please try again :) Robin and Michelle Achievements will not be reflected in updates if you deleted the game without saving the data on Diary in the past.
